meanings.definition: A member of a council of ten men in ancient Rome.
meanings.sent1: In ancient Rome, the decemvirs were responsible for important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The decemvirs gathered to discuss matters of governance in Rome.
meanings.sent3: The decemvirs met under the shade of a large oak tree to deliberate on city matters.
meanings.sent4: The decemvirs stood united like a mighty oak, each one representing a different aspect of leadership.
meanings.sent5: The decemvirs' authority was as solid as the roots of the ancient oak tree.

meanings.definition: The body of ten men in ancient Rome who were appointed to draw up a code of laws.
meanings.sent1: The decemvirs worked diligently to create fair laws for the people of Rome.
meanings.sent2: In ancient Rome, the decemvirs were tasked with drafting legal regulations.
meanings.sent3: The decemvirs' pens scratched furiously as they penned down the laws of the land.
meanings.sent4: The decemvirs' words became the pillars of justice in the city.
meanings.sent5: The decemvirs' code of laws stood as a beacon of order in a chaotic world.
